department: Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
full_summary:
### Government Tender: Data Modellers

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-92-60423739
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: 20230711
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-03T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not specified
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

#### Contract Details

* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Procedure**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contract Location

* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
* **Address**: 255 Albert St, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0H2, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Andrew Bryant, contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca, (343) 571-8507

#### Tender Description

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) has a requirement for the provision of Data Modeller professional services resources to support the Application Services (AS) organization in the planning, design, build, and maintenance of applications. The selected supplier will be responsible for providing data modellers to support the development of data models, as well as to provide maintenance and support for existing applications.

#### Tender Documents

* **Tender Notice (English)**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21514/notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp_en.pdf
* **Tender Notice (French)**:
